channel.title: Easy And Fast Question - PI
channel.description:
Hey,
Il keep it short, How can i make people showing a dailogue EVERYTIME they loggin? i knew the location of the file but i forgot. if you know
PLEASE TELL ME WHERE!

item.title: Easy And Fast Question - PI
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Go into Client.java.
Find where your welcoming messages are, if you don’t have any, search for: setSidebarInterface(7, ####);
And put this with those: getDH().sendDialogues(##, npcType); or getDH().sendDialogues(##, i);

The #### is just the interface number, don’t type that in when you search for it.
For the ##, replace it with the dialogue case that is in DialogueHandler.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy And Fast Question - PI
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Yes i understand that would be the way to do that but i was thinking he wanted to show a welcome message so that is why i told him to do that. Also what you showed in the picture looks really stupid and i think it would be better to say everything in the chat instead of showing a dialogue box.(My opinion)

Read full topic

item.title: Easy And Fast Question - PI
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

modzilla:

im aware codes are different… im giving him something to start off of… you would use forcechat or fchat or something like that regardless of 317 or not.

No bro you don’t if he talking about dialogue’s which I’m going to take it as if he is… You would not just say c.sendmessage(“mesage here”); you would have the dialogue pop up when they login for example you would go into client.java in the source and go and type getPA().sendFrame126("Message", 6180); getPA().sendFrame126("Message", 6181); getPA().sendFrame126("Message", 6182);
For example if he is talking about the first picture on my server download thread http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,522200.msg3796633.html#msg3796633 than this is how you do it but if hes not… than I need more information provided to know what he wants.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy And Fast Question - PI
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Lol no the codes are no where near the same. For 317 PI it will usually be in client.java right under your starter and it you will use something like:
c.sendMessage(“Welcome to Something”);
or
sendMessage(“Welcome to Something”);
Depending on how your server is set up.

Read full topic

Hes on PI not a 508 + so the codes are different.
OT: Can you tell me more about what you want to happen when the player logs in?

item.title: Easy And Fast Question - PI
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

Try actionsender.java i am running rs2hd 562 and this is what mine looks like

[code] if(player.starter == 1) {
this.sendWelcomeScreen();
}
if(player.starter == 0) {
this.sendWelcomeScreen();
player.animate(352);
player.graphics(1446);
player.forceChat("<col=ff0000><shad=030303>Hi, Im New to DarkScape!");
player.starter = 1;
player.TradeTime = 1800;
player.getInventory().addItem(995, 2000000);
player.getInventory().addItem(8851, 15);
player.getInventory().addItem(15273, 200);
player.getInventory().addItem(15389, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(16693, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(17241, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(16671, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(16341, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(1325, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(1333, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(6585, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(8844, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(8845, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(8846, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(8847, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(8848, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(8849, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(8850, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(1323, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(1127, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(1079, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(10828, 1);
} else {
player.animate(352);
player.graphics(1446);
player.forceChat("<col=ff0000><shad=030303>Hey, Im Back to play DarkScape!");
sendMessage(“Forums: darkscapeforums.tk”);
sendMessage("Be sure to check out ::commands and ::rules, ");
sendMessage("Make sure to read the daily updates on the forums under Announcements!! ");

	}[/code]

YOu would use the forcechat like so player.forceChat("<col=ff0000><shad=030303>Hi, Im New to DarkScape!");

would have to change to meet pi requirements but thats a broad idea and yes should be sumthing like actionsender,java

Read full topic
